name: fleetness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the ability to run or move quickly: fleetness of foot They relied on their excellent eyesight and fleetness of foot. He was saved only by the fleetness of his team. See
fleet
More examplesFewer examplesThe sea birds moved with a fleetness that was truly breathtaking.He was the picture of fleetness and energy.She darted with the fleetness of an arrow in the direction of the tree.
